Review_Text: What a motivational heart filling documentary. What todays youth needs is this kind of training and discipline which will shape up their lives. Ladakh scouts - salute to you. The instructors - double salute to you. God bless ! I hope HRD dept recognise their services and design similar courses and must be made compulsory for all the youth. I am so glad that I watched this great documentary.
Randeep Hooda, Narration is best. Must watch because it depicts how soldiers are made, how they are trained and mostly it is about Real Heroes of Nation.
Best series on the indian military force....Every Indian must watch this incrediable series....
Everyone should watch this. After watch this everyone can understand the spirit of them.
SpoilerIf you don't like documentaries, then skip it.. it will save your time. If you are a big fan of these type of documentry, then you can watch it with no expectations.
